程序包 com.topcoder.commons.utils

This is a package info file.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ExceptionHelper
    This is a static helper class that provides methods for constructing exception instances using reflection.
    Log4jUtility
    This is a utility class that provides static methods for logging method entrance, method exit and exception using Log4j library.
    LoggingUtilityHelper
    This is a static helper class that provides log message generation functionality for LoggingWrapperUtility and Log4jUtility.
    PropertiesUtility
    This is a utility class that provides static methods for retrieving properties of different types (String, Integer, Long, Double, Date, Class) from Properties instance.
    ValidationUtility
    This is a utility class that provides static methods for checking whether some arbitrary value meets specific criteria (not null, not empty, positive, negative, etc).
